 2006-14952006-12-06,  ,  HERITAGE,  , 
ActBroadcasting Act
PrecisAppointment of EDNA TURPIN of St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, in the place of Howard W. McNutt.
